item.title: How Can You Cope With Big Data?
item.description:
The sheer size of “Big Data” is a popular topic, but what does it really mean? Does the thought of managing massive amounts of data feel overwhelming, or do you see it as an opportunity? Ensuring you have the right infrastructure and connectivity is essential. Discover the cloud and connection services tailored for your business’s location...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/how-can-you-cope-with-big-data/

item.title: The Millennial 20/20 APAC Summit will span two days and focus on the future of commerce
item.description:
Source: Millennial 20/20. From September 7th to 8th, 2016, Singapore will be the site of the Millennial 20/20 APAC Summit. This two-day event will feature discussions centered around understanding the millennial consumer, with over 130 speakers, interactive exhibits, 50 panel discussions, and 24 keynote presentations and interviews. Rupa Ganatra, Founding Partner of Millennial 20/20, emphasizes the rapid changes in the marketplace driven by millennials, stating that the summit will be crucial for brands to adapt and remain relevant in this influential movement...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-millennial-20-20-apac-summit-will-span-two-days-and-focus-on-the-future-of-commerce/

item.title: Brands that optimize their apps for mobile devices experience an increase in sales
item.description:
Source: Criteo website, Q3 2015 State Of Mobile Commerce report Criteo, a performance marketing technology company, has published its Q3 2015 State of Mobile Commerce report, providing marketers with valuable insights into consumer behavior and sales trends in the mobile commerce sector. The report, which analyzed 1.4 billion online transactions, found that half of all purchases globally now involve multiple devices. Southeast Asia demonstrated a strong mobile commerce presence, with a 45% conversion rate on mobile devices, significantly increasing from 27% in the previous quarter...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/brands-that-optimize-their-apps-for-mobile-devices-experience-an-increase-in-sales/

item.title: Your Business Website is $7
item.description:
Having a business website is essential in today’s digital world. However, the cost of building a website can be a barrier for many businesses. While custom websites can cost thousands of dollars, even basic websites can cost hundreds per year for hosting. But imagine having a professional website and domain for less than $7 annually. This is not a dream. For $6.99 yearly, a major web hosting provider offers domain registration and a five-page website builder...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/your-business-website-is-7/
